import React from 'react'; import { useState } from 'react'; import './Table.css'; import { Modal, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; const OpenFormButton = () => { const cellStyle1 = { border: '0.3px solid black', padding: '8px', background: "#0eacb3", color: "white", fontSize: "13px", fontWeight: "400" }; const cellStyle2 = { border: '0.3px solid black', padding: '8px', width: '300px', background: "#75d0d4", color: "white", fontSize: "13px", fontWeight: "400" }; const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); const rows = Array.from(Array(27).keys()); const rowNames = ["Rake Name", "Rake ID", "Rake Category", "Originating Station", "Indent No. & Date.", "Commodity", "Wagon Type, Loco No", "No of Wagons loaded at Originating Station as per WWB/ NR wagons enroute", "Wagons description", "Nos. of Wagons Received / Loaded / Empty", "Serving Station Arrival", "Line Clear / For Siding/ Line no /Reason for Delay", "Serving Station Departure", "Siding Arvl. / Plmt. / At Siding/ Line no", "Railway Placement time", "Unloading start Time", "Unloading Completion Time & Delay Reason", "Rake Formation Compl./Line No", "Rake Release/Line No/Total Wagons Released /Back Loading", "EOT / Reasons for Delay in EOT", "C&W EXAM/AP READY", "Defficiency in wagons parts (Multiple)", "Attached & Detached Wagons/ BV", "Derailment / No of wagons /Line no/ Rerailment/ Damage /Reasons for derailment", "Line Clear Recvd Time / To Station", "Siding Departure TIme / From siding / Reasons for Delay in Ready to Dep.", "Serving Station Arvl. Time"]; return ( <> {rows.map((row, index) => ( ))}
Column 1 Column 2
{rowNames[index % rowNames.length]} {index === 0 ? ( ) : ( 'Data' )}
); }; export default OpenFormButton;
